languages.text: "Какой ты послушный! Но мне просто хотелось узнать как быстро ты отречешься от веры и начнешь лебезить. Живым ты отсюда, конечно же, не выйдешь".

traits.locale_text: "Какой ты послушный! Но мне просто хотелось узнать как быстро ты отречешься от Императора и начнешь лебезить. Живым ты отсюда, конечно же, не выйдешь".

languages.text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."
languages.original_text: "Какой ты послушный! Но мне просто хотелось узнать как быстро ты отречешься от веры и начнешь лебезить. Живым ты отсюда, конечно же, не выйдешь".

traits.locale_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce the Emperor and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."
"You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce the Emperor and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."
"You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."
"You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."
"You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."
"You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

languages.text: “你可真恭顺！不过，我只想考验你一下，看看你多快就会放弃信仰，屈从于邪恶的诱惑。很明显，我不能让你活着离开这里。”
languages.original_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

traits.locale_text: “你可真恭顺！不过，我只想考验你一下，看看你多快就会放弃信仰，屈从于邪恶的诱惑。很明显，我不能让你活着离开这里。”

languages.text: 「従順なのだな！だが、お前がどれだけ早く信仰を捨て、屈服するかを見たかっただけだ。当然だが生きては帰れないだろう」
languages.original_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

traits.locale_text: 「従順なのだな！だが、お前がどれだけ早く信仰を捨て、屈服するかを見たかっただけだ。当然だが生きては帰れないだろう」

languages.text: «¡Qué dócil! Yo solo quería ver lo rápido que renunciaba a su fe y empezaba a arrastrarse. Es obvio que no va a salir vivo de esta».
languages.original_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué dócil! Yo solo quería ver lo rápido que renunciaba a su fe y empezaba a arrastrarse. Es obvio que no va a salir vivo de esta».

languages.text: "Wie fügsam Ihr seid! Aber ich wollte nur sehen, wie schnell Ihr Eurem Glauben abschwört und zu buckeln anfangt. Ihr kommt natürlich nicht lebendig hier raus."
languages.original_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

traits.locale_text: "Wie fügsam Ihr seid! Aber ich wollte nur sehen, wie schnell Ihr Eurem Glauben abschwört und zu buckeln anfangt. Ihr kommt natürlich nicht lebendig hier raus."

languages.text: « Vous êtes si docile ! Mais je voulais simplement voir avec quel empressement vous renonceriez à votre foi et vous mettriez à ramper. Ne comptez pas trop sortir d'ici vivant. »
languages.original_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes si docile ! Mais je voulais simplement voir avec quel empressement vous renonceriez à votre foi et vous mettriez à ramper. Ne comptez pas trop sortir d'ici vivant. »

languages.text: "Amma uysalmışsın! Fakat sadece inancından ne çabuk vazgeçip yalvarmaya başlayacağını görmek istemiştim. Tabii ki buradan canlı çıkamayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "You are so docile! But I merely wanted to see how quickly you would renounce your faith and start grovelling. You are obviously not getting out of here alive."

traits.locale_text: "Amma uysalmışsın! Fakat sadece inancından ne çabuk vazgeçip yalvarmaya başlayacağını görmek istemiştim. Tabii ki buradan canlı çıkamayacaksın."
